dict.acceptation: 布，织物；一块布；用作某种用途的布，桌布，擦布，揩布；（统称）牧师；

sent.orig: Distribution of the cloth, cloth, sofa, cloth, automobile fabrics, printed cloth variety, reasonable prices.
sent.trans: 经销的布艺、窗帘布、沙发布、台布、汽车布、印花布品种齐全、价格合理。

sent.orig: Business scope: oxford cloth, silk glossy cloth, cloth, canvas, elastic cloth, etc.
sent.trans: 经营范围：各种牛津布，丝光布，棉布，帆布，四面弹等。

sent.orig: Also, velvet fabric, velvet cloth, green shade cloth, cotton cloth or cotton twill fabrics.
sent.trans: 布料有丝绒布、天鹅绒布、环保遮光布、棉织布、全棉斜纹布以供选择。

sent.orig: The ends of piece of cloth lie in the water so the cloth stays wet.
sent.trans: 每块布料的末端都位于水中，使这些布料保持潮湿。

sent.orig: The ins ends of each piece of cloth lie in the water so cloth stays wet.
sent.trans: 每一层外包布的末端都浸在水中以保持湿润。
